data.text:
Aaron Diaz is a Mexican actor, singer and model. He is known for his roles in the telenovelas Teresa and Lola, rase una vez. He has also released several albums, including "Aaron Diaz" and "Hombre de Fe".

Aaron Diaz was born on March 7, 1982, in Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco, Mexico. He began his career as a model before transitioning to acting. He made his acting debut in the telenovela "Clase 406" in 2002. He has since appeared in a number of telenovelas, including "Teresa" (2010), "Lola, rase una vez" (2007), and "Tierra de reyes" (2014).

In addition to his acting career, Aaron Diaz has also released several albums. His debut album, "Aaron Diaz", was released in 2009. He has since released two more albums, "Hombre de Fe" (2011) and "Aaron Diaz III" (2013).

Aaron Diaz is married to Lola Ponce, an Argentine actress and singer. They have two children together.

Aaron Diaz

Net Worth: $8 million
